EditText.android:text: Record below the patient ID numbers of 20 patients prescribed ACTs from the Pharmacy Register.\nLocate the patient IDs from Step 1 in the Laboratory and/or Clinical Registers and record their test result in the appropriate column.

In the Laboratory Register, record the patient ID numbers 20 patients: 5 RDT +; 5 RDT -; 5 microscopy +; 5 microscopy -.\nLocate the patient IDs from Step 1 in the Pharmacy Register and record whether they received ACTs in the “ACT Prescribed” column by ticking either Y or N. For health facilities without microscopy, tick the N/A box
